video.title: H2O: Just Add Water
video.synopsis: The gals in this fantasy series cope with the burden of growing a giant fin and transforming into mermaids whenever they come in contact with water.

episodes.synopsis: Emma, Cleo and Rikki are just three ordinary teenage girls with ordinary teenage issues, until one magical day when they're transformed into mermaids.
episodes.title: Metamorphosis

episodes.synopsis: The girls are trying to keep their fish tails a secret, but when socialite Miriam throws a pool party, all they can do is try to stay dry.
episodes.title: Pool Party

episodes.synopsis: When the girls learn that sea turtles are getting caught in nets, it's Rikki and Emma to the rescue. But fishermen think they've got a shark problem.
episodes.title: Catch of the Day

episodes.synopsis: Emma is having second thoughts about throwing her annual sleepover party, but Rikki and Cleo manage to convince her otherwise.
episodes.title: Party Girls

episodes.synopsis: When Cleo's little sister gets her mitts on Cleo's diary, she threatens to expose the three friends for the "evil mermaids" she thinks they are.
episodes.title: Something Fishy

episodes.synopsis: Emma's kid brother, Elliot, tries to prove his fearlessness by hanging ten, but when a big wave takes him down, Rikki comes to his rescue.
episodes.title: Young Love

episodes.synopsis: As the full moon approaches, Miss Chatham issues a dire warning that Cleo just can't bring herself to take seriously.
episodes.title: Moon Spell

episodes.synopsis: Lewis takes a job as research assistant to a noted marine biologist, but the girls are worried that he might slip and give away their secret.
episodes.title: The Denman Affair

episodes.synopsis: Rikki collects rare fish for a breeder. However, when Rikki finds out he's poaching the fish, she's determined to restore the balance of nature.
episodes.title: Dangerous Waters

episodes.synopsis: The girls are inspired by a film contest on the subject of heroes. Emma focuses on her mom as her subject, but this holds no interest for Rikki.
episodes.title: The Camera Never Lies

episodes.synopsis: When Byron seeks coaching from Emma, she's torn over what to do. After all, it's a huge risk that threatens to expose her secret.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim

episodes.synopsis: The moon is full again, and Cleo feels its powerful effects, singing a siren song that has the boys all over town swooning.
episodes.title: The Siren Effect

episodes.synopsis: Miss Chatham keeps speaking of a treasure she's out to retrieve, and when Zane gets wind of it, he wants in on the action.
episodes.title: Shipwrecked

episodes.synopsis: Cleo confronts the reality of yet another birthday party thrown by her dad. Zane is out to learn the identity of the sea creature that saved his life.
episodes.title: Surprise!

episodes.synopsis: Emma loves her job at the café, at least until she's left in charge of new employee Rikki, who doesn't take kindly to her authoritarian ways.
episodes.title: The Big Chill

episodes.synopsis: Zane seeks assistance from Cleo in his hunt for the sea monster that saved him, which leads to her family believing that Zane is Cleo's boyfriend.
episodes.title: Lovesick

episodes.synopsis: When a thunderstorm threatens to out the girls as mermaids, they pretend to be sick. But their lie attracts the attention of their parents.
episodes.title: Under the Weather

episodes.synopsis: The full moon is back, and this time it's Rikki's turn to fall under its sway. She loses control of her powers and flees to Mako Island.
episodes.title: Bad Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: Cleo's cousin Angela is a force to be reckoned with. While Cleo's dad mistakes her for a model of maturity, she proves to be a reckless wild child.
episodes.title: Hurricane Angela

episodes.synopsis: Lewis enters a fishing contest, and Cleo uses her powers to help him win. However, her plan backfires when Lewis is accused of cheating.
episodes.title: Hook, Line and Sinker

episodes.synopsis: Emma dyes her hair red, with decidedly mixed results. Zane's quest for the sea monster leads him to Miss Chatham and her old homestead.
episodes.title: Red Herring

episodes.synopsis: Romance heats up between Rikki and Zane, and Cleo and Emma find out. Cleo demands that Rikki choose between her mer-friends and her new boy.
episodes.title: Fish Out of Water

episodes.synopsis: When Rikki spies a locket with an uncanny resemblance to Miss Chatham's in a jewelry shop, Zane doesn't understand her desperate desire to possess it.
episodes.title: In Too Deep

episodes.synopsis: Emma and Cleo hope that Byron and Lewis will ask them to the school dance. Lewis is left to ponder the significance of science vs. magic.
episodes.title: Love Potion #9

episodes.synopsis: Emma refuses to accompany her family on their annual vacation. Dr. Denman's return brings Zane even closer to learning the secret of his sea monster.
episodes.title: Dr. Danger

episodes.synopsis: Their mermaid identities no longer a secret, Cleo, Emma and Rikki must evade a trap being laid by the devious Dr. Denman.
episodes.title: A Twist in the Tail

episodes.synopsis: Under the full moon, the girls' powers are enhanced and wreak havoc on Lewis in his boat. The next day the girls realize they still need Lewis.
episodes.title: Stormy Weather

episodes.synopsis: Emma uses her powers to help Elliott at soccer. Lewis decides to test the girls' increased powers. Cleo hates Lewis's smothering and dumps him.
episodes.title: Control

episodes.synopsis: Zane's back in town and still in love with Rikki. He works out she's still a mermaid and tries to win her back. Cleo becomes suspicious of Lewis.
episodes.title: The One That Got Away

episodes.synopsis: Rikki comes to stay at Emma's house. In trying to compete with Rikki, Emma tries to rebel and throws a party. Nate uses Lewis to make a play for Cleo.
episodes.title: Fire and Ice

episodes.synopsis: Lewis finds an old book on mermaids and tests out a potion recipe. Cleo tries to get Don and her mum together by using her powers to grant him a wish.
episodes.title: Hocus Pocus

episodes.synopsis: Don appears to have a girlfriend and Cleo is shocked to find it is Charlotte's mother. Lewis becomes aware of Charlotte's feelings for him.
episodes.title: Pressure Cooker

episodes.synopsis: A mermaid prank gone wrong leads to a dolphin going missing at the Marine Park and Lewis has to take the fall to protect the girls.
episodes.title: In Hot Water

episodes.synopsis: Zane argues with a man, but little does he know it's Rikki's dad. Rikki has to overcome her shame about her background and introduce her dad to Zane.
episodes.title: Wrong Side of the Tracks

episodes.synopsis: A horse falls ill and Emma must use her powers to fix it. Lewis accidentally invites both Charlotte and Cleo to an awards dinner.
episodes.title: Riding for a Fall

episodes.synopsis: Cleo is failing at school and is assigned Charlotte as a tutor. Cleo wants Lewis back but her attitude to Charlotte only drives him further away.
episodes.title: Missed the Boat

episodes.synopsis: Zane hears of a treasure under the ocean and enlists the girls to find it. During the search, Rikki's friendship with Emma and Cleo is tested.
episodes.title: In Over our Heads

episodes.synopsis: Emma starts acting weird after pricking her finger on a barb of coral. She becomes more and more like a fish and Lewis has to find a way to cure her.
episodes.title: Fish Fever

episodes.synopsis: Don takes the family camping on Mako Island during a full moon. The girls are affected and need the moon pool for sanctuary.
episodes.title: Moonwalker

episodes.synopsis: Emma thinks she's going to get a promotion at the juice bar but Ash is given the job. Lewis stands up to Charlotte over spending time with Cleo.
episodes.title: Get Off My Trail

episodes.synopsis: Lewis and Zane discover the scent of ambergris sends mermaids wild. But it backfires when Nate finds out and has all three mermaid girls on his arm!
episodes.title: Irresistible

episodes.synopsis: Lewis has a dream about mermaids being discovered. It threatens to come true when Cleo finds herself in trouble underwater in front of a crowd.
episodes.title: Double Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Cleo and Rikki push Ash into asking Emma out again. Rikki and Cleo are both moonstruck and Ash looks set to discover Emma's secret.
episodes.title: Moonstruck

episodes.synopsis: When Zane and Ash clash, Rikki and Emma take their boyfriends' sides. Cleo is left alone celebrating their anniversary of becoming mermaids.
episodes.title: The Heat is On

episodes.synopsis: Lewis tracks down mermaid researcher Max Hamilton and finds that he knows a lot more about mermaids than Lewis first thought.
episodes.title: The Gracie Code, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Ash comes close to finding out about Emma. Charlotte finds an old movie of her grandmother... as a mermaid!
episodes.title: The Gracie Code, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte follows Lewis to Max Hamilton. Max tells all to Charlotte when he discovers she's the granddaughter of his one true love.
episodes.title: An Then There Were Four

episodes.synopsis: The girls have to deal with a fourth mermaid who turns out to be a loose cannon. Charlotte almost turns into a mermaid at a volleyball competition.
episodes.title: Bubble Bubble Toil and Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Despite the girls' attempts to keep Charlotte under control, she uses her powers on Nate and almost exposes them all.
episodes.title: Reckless

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte organizes a surprise party for Lewis, annoying Rikki. At the party, Charlotte is jealous of Cleo and traps her and Emma in a pool room.
episodes.title: Three's Company

episodes.synopsis: Cleo is bullied by Charlotte and runs away to the ocean. Lewis discovers what Charlotte has been up to and breaks up with her.
episodes.title: Sea Change

episodes.synopsis: The full moon rises, and with the planets lining up, it can remove mermaid powers for good. Knowing this, Lewis lures Charlotte to the moon pool.
episodes.title: Unfathomable

episodes.synopsis: Cleo and Rikki face their final year of high school. They make a new friend in Bella, meet new boy Will and encounter a strange force on Mako Island.
episodes.title: The Awakening

episodes.synopsis: Will seeks confirmation of his first experience on Mako Island. Bella volunteers to misdirect his search so he won't find the moon pool.
episodes.title: Jungle Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Cleo seeks a new job as an assistant dolphin trainer at the Marine Park. Rikki fires Nate's band from playing at the cafe.
episodes.title: Keep Your Enemies Close

episodes.synopsis: Cleo's forced to put Lewis's plans for romance on hold to restrain Kim's out-of-control love life. Don meets Samantha and they start to date.
episodes.title: Valentine's Day

episodes.synopsis: Zane concocts a dirt bike race to publicize the cafe. When Rikki discovers it's a scam, she and Bella decide to teach him and Nate a lesson.
episodes.title: Big Ideas

episodes.synopsis: Bella starts a relationship with Will. Lewis tests the moon pool water at school and attracts the attention of the science teacher.
episodes.title: Secrets & Lies

episodes.synopsis: A beach picnic leads Don to end his relationship with Samantha until Cleo encourages him to pursue it. Sophie competes with Bella for a cafe job.
episodes.title: Happy Families

episodes.synopsis: Rikki and Bella hide out at Cleo's to protect themselves from a full moon attack. Bella's kidnapped by a water tentacle and taken to Mako Island.
episodes.title: Kidnapped

episodes.synopsis: Cleo defies Lewis's advice and experiments with the magic moon pool water. Using her powers, Rikki accidentally gets the water into Cleo's aquarium.
episodes.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice

episodes.synopsis: Bella's warned to back off from Will as he's on the trail of the girls' mermaid secrets. She gets too close to him and he discovers she's a mermaid.
episodes.title: Revealed

episodes.synopsis: Bella helps Will with his free-diving training, but when she realizes he's more interested in her as a mermaid than a girl, she's hurt.
episodes.title: Just a Girl at Heart

episodes.synopsis: Rikki receives counterfeit money at the cafe and is held captive by criminals on a boat. Bella and Cleo are forced to reveal the trio's secret.
episodes.title: Crime & Punishment

episodes.synopsis: Kim tries derailing Don and Samantha's wedding. Lewis receives an opportunity to study in America. Cleo learns to let Lewis live his own life.
episodes.title: To Have & to Hold Back

episodes.synopsis: Will pushes himself too far when Zane challenges him to prove his skills as a free-diver. The girls discover a crystal in the rock from the moon pool.
episodes.title: Mermaid Magic

episodes.synopsis: Sophie uses Bella's idea for a fundraising concert and presents it as her own to Rikki. Samantha moves in and puts her stamp on the Sertori home.
episodes.title: Power Play

episodes.synopsis: Rikki goes to Mako Island to confront the strange force in the moon pool. Will pursues her and discovers she's been affected by the experience.
episodes.title: The Dark Side

episodes.synopsis: Cleo's introduced to Ryan, a young geophysicist who's working for Samantha. Rikki doesn't react well to Cleo consulting Ryan about the Mako rock.
episodes.title: A Magnetic Attraction

episodes.synopsis: Rikki fears Ryan's explorations on Mako Island will uncover their secrets and almost goes too far trying to stop him from discovering the moon pool.
episodes.title: Into the Light

episodes.synopsis: Will competes in the Free-Diving Championships but afterward chooses to break from the sport and shrug off Sophie's influence on his life.
episodes.title: Breakaway

episodes.synopsis: Zane installs Sophie as head of staff at the cafe. Bella develops an allergy that triggers her powers. Sophie looks to fire Bella and the band.
episodes.title: Queen for a Day

episodes.synopsis: The girls discover the crystals contain immense energy and need to mount a rescue mission when Zane steals one in an effort to gain Rikki's attention.
episodes.title: The Jewel Thief

episodes.synopsis: The girls have to avoid a water attack when the full moon rises early. They confront the water force and are given a message about Mako Island.
episodes.title: Mako Masters

episodes.synopsis: Bella's eager to ask Will to the end-of-year party until she sees him asking Rikki. A misunderstanding prompts Will to express his feelings for Bella.
episodes.title: Beach Party

episodes.synopsis: Don gets a second job at the Marine Park on the pirate ship and outshines Cleo, threatening the future of her dolphin show.
episodes.title: Too Close for Comfort

episodes.synopsis: Cleo discovers that a comet is causing fish to flee the waters around Mako Island, and the girls learn that the comet will soon collide with Earth.
episodes.title: A Date with Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Sophie and Ryan damage the moon pool in their efforts to obtain the rare crystals. The girls use their own magic to prevent the impact of the comet.
episodes.title: Graduation
